response.name: Absol
response.notes: All of Absol's attacks and damaging moves can critically strike. Absol's Critical-Hit rate increases at levels 5 and 9.

skills.name: Super Luck
skills.description: Increased Critical-Hit rate by 15%.

rsb.name: Super Luck
rsb.true_desc: Increases Critical-Hit rate by 15%.

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing damage to enemies and lowering their Defense by 15% for 2s when it hits. If this boosted attack hits only a single target, it deals increased damage.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing damage to enemies and lowering their Defense by 15% for 2s when it hits. If this boosted attack hits only a single target, it deals increased damage.

boosted_rsb.name: Boosted
boosted_rsb.label: Damage - Boosted
boosted_rsb.true_desc: Hitting an enemy with a boosted auto reduces enemy defense by 15% for 2s.

skills.name: Feint
skills.description: Dash in an arc, attacking enemies that come in contact with Absol. This move ignores the defense stat and shield effects of enemies.

rsb.name: Feint
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Absol dashes in an arc, damaging all enemies hit. Each use alternates between a left and right arc. Feint ignores the target’s Defense and bypasses all shields.

upgrades.name: Night Slash
upgrades.description1: Dash in an outward arc, dealing damage to enemies. If this first attack hits, a second attack can also be performed. The second attack has the user dash straight ahead, dealing damage to enemies and increasing the user's critical-hit rate. The lower the enemies HP, the more the user's critical-hit rate is increased.
upgrades.description2: Using this move again will restore the user's HP.

rsb.name: Night Slash
rsb.label: Damage - First Hit
rsb.true_desc: Absol dashes in an arc, damaging the first Pokémon hit. If Absol hits, this ability can be activated within 6s – allowing Absol to dash again, dealing damage to all enemies hit and increasing attack speed once again. The second hit also has 30% increased Critical-Hit Rate on enemies below 50% max HP.
rsb.notes: Cooldown on Hit or without recasting is 6s.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Absol heals for 50% of damage dealt on the second hit, including critical hits.

upgrades.name: Pursuit
upgrades.description1: Dash to the designated location and quickly charge an enemy with the next basic attack. (Basic attack range is doubled while this effect is active). If the basic attack lands from behind, its damage is increased and this move's cooldown is reduced.
upgrades.description2: Increased movement speed.

rsb.name: Pursuit
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Absol dashes to a location, and dashes to an enemy with its next auto attack. If Absol hits the back of the target, this ability's cooldown is reduced by 80%. If it fails to hit the back, damage is reduced. The next auto attack stays empowered for 3s.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Absol gains 35% increased movement speed for 2s after the initial dash.

skills.name: Slash
skills.description: Slash with sharp claws in front of the user, increasing this move's critical-hit rate.

rsb.name: Slash
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Absol quickly slashes in front of themself, damaging any enemy hit by the slash. Slash has an increased critical-hit rate by 15%.

upgrades.name: Psycho Cut
upgrades.description1: Attack with blades formed by psychic power that decrease the movement speed of enemies for a short time when this move hits. Also increases basic attack damage dealt to the affected enemy for up to 3 attacks after this move hits.
upgrades.description2: Also increases movement speed for a short time when the user gets close to the enemy that this move hit.

rsb.name: Psycho Cut
rsb.label: Damage - Initial Hit
rsb.true_desc: Throw a wide slash forward; damaging and slowing enemies hit by 90% for 2s. This slow decreases by 25% every 0.5s. Enemies hit are marked for 5s with 3 cleansable marks. When Absol deals damage to a marked enemy, a mark is consumed, dealing extra damage. All damage dealt by Psycho Cut or its marks have a 15% increased Critical-Hit Rate.
rsb.add1_true_desc: Three slash markers are added. The first two deal 2x damage when triggered, the third deals 3x damage.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases Absol's movement speed by 20% when near a debuffed enemy.

upgrades.name: Sucker Punch
upgrades.description1: Look for an opening to attack an enemy, decreasing the movement speed of the user and the target enemy for the duration. After a short time, charge forward to attack the enemy. However, if the user receives damage or gets attacked before it charges, attack immediately and shove the enemy.
upgrades.description2: Increases basic attack speed for a short time when this move hits.

rsb.name: Sucker Punch
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Absol targets an enemy and enters a counter stance for 1s, decreasing the movement speed of the target enemy and Absol by 50% for the duration and negating all damage and effects of the next attack on Absol. While in counter stance, if Absol is attacked or the target attacks, Absol immediately exits counter stance and leaps behind the target, stunning it and dealing damage. If the attack is not triggered before the counter stance expires, Absol leaps behind the target, stunning them and dealing damage.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases Attack Speed by 40% for 3s after using this move.

skills.name: Midnight Slash
skills.description: Unleashes a flurry of slashes in front of the user. This move ends by unleashing powerful blades of energy, dealing increased damage to enemies and shoves them.

rsb.name: Midnight Slash
rsb.label: Damage - Full (6 Hits)
rsb.true_desc: Unleash a flurry of 5 slashes in front of Absol and become untargetable for 1.15s. This move ends by unleashing powerful blades of energy, shoving enemies and dealing damage up to 4 times at melee range and down to 1 time at maximum range. Only the first ending hit connecting with an enemy does full damage, the others, deal 30% damage to the same target.

response.name: Azumarill
response.notes: All of Marill and Azumarill attacks and damaging moves can critically strike, but the damage is 150% instead of 200%.

skills.name: Huge Power
skills.description: When this Pokémon hits only a single enemy with a basic attack, a move, or their Unite Move, the hit is always a critical hit. However, when hitting two or more enemies at once with a basic attack, a move, or its Unite Move, the hits are never critical hits.

rsb.name: Huge Power
rsb.true_desc: When this Pokémon hits only a single enemy with an auto attack, a move, or their Unite Move, the hit is always a critical hit. However, when hitting two or more enemies at once with an auto attack, a move, or its Unite Move, the hits are never critical hits.

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing increased damage to enemies within a cone area of effect in front of this Pokémon.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing increased damage to enemies within a cone area of effect in front of this Pokémon.

skills.name: Tackle
skills.description: Charge forward, dealing damage to any enemy hit and leave them unable to act for a short time.

rsb.name: Tackle
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Charge forward; dealing damage to any enemy hit and leave them unable to act for a short time.

upgrades.name: Play Rough
upgrades.description1: Increase movement speed for a short time and change the next basic attack. When Azumarill performs their next basic attack, lunge at one enemy in range and deliver repeated blows; dealing damage to that target and leave it unable to act for a short time.
upgrades.description2: Further increas movement speed when this move is used, and also reduce this move’s cooldown.

rsb.name: Play Rough
rsb.label: Damage - per Hit (3 hits)
rsb.true_desc: Increase movement speed by 35% for 4s and change the next auto attack. When performing the next auto attack, lunge at one enemy in range and deliver repeated blows; dealing damage to that target and leave it unable to act for .75s.
rsb.notes: Using Play Rough will overwrite any active Aqua Tail attack change. Play Rough attacks count as auto attacks for the purpose of items, lifesteal and other benefits.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Further increases movement speed when this move is used, and also reduces this move’s cooldown by 1s.

upgrades.name: Water Pulse
upgrades.description1: Shoot a pulsing blast of water in front of Azumarill. When the blast of water hits an enemy, decrease that Pokémon’s movement speed and deal damage to all enemies in an area of effect around the initial target hit. The blast of water then automatically bounces to another target if one is available. Including the first target, the blast of water can bounce between up to 3 targets consecutively, and each hit behaves in the same way as the first. While the blast of water is traveling, Azumarill can perform a short rolling dash in a designated direction.
upgrades.description2: Increase the maximum number of targets that the blast of water can bounce between by 2.

rsb.name: Water Pulse
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Shoot a pulsing blast of water in front of Azumarill. When the blast of water hits an enemy, decrease their movement speed for 2s and deal damage to all enemies in an area of effect around the initial target.
rsb.notes: The blast of water then automatically bounces to another target if one is available. Including the first target, the blast of water can bounce between up to three targets consecutively, and each hit behaves in the same way as the first. While the blast of water is traveling, Azumarill can perform a short rolling dash in a designated direction.

skills.name: Bubble
skills.description: Spray bubbles in a cone; dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and decrease their movement speed for a short time. This move can be used while moving.

rsb.name: Bubble
rsb.label: Damage - Initial Hit
rsb.true_desc: Spray bubbles in a cone; dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and decreasing their movement speed for a short time. This move can be used while moving.
rsb.add1_true_desc: Subsequent hits on the same target deal 25% damage.

upgrades.name: Whirlpool
upgrades.description1: For a short time, four small whirlpools appear that swirl around Azumarill as they move. If a whirlpool hits an enemy, the whirlpool deals damage and restores Azumarill's HP. If a whirlpool hits an enemy player, an increased amount of HP is restored.
upgrades.description2: Reduce this move’s cooldown and increases the amount of HP it restored.

rsb.name: Whirlpool
rsb.label: Damage - per Hit
rsb.true_desc: For a short time, four small whirlpools appear that swirl around Azumarill as it moves. If a whirlpool hits an enemy, the whirlpool deals damage to them and restores Azumarill's HP. If a whirlpool hits an enemy player, an increased amount of HP is restored.
rsb.notes: Note: Moving clockwise against your target will grant more hits against that target, and counter-clockwise will reduce the number of hits.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Reduces this move’s cooldown by 2s and increases the amount of HP restored.

upgrades.name: Aqua Tail
upgrades.description1: Increases the speed and area of effect of Azumarill's next 3 basic attacks. If these basic attacks hit from a distance, they also deal increased damage, restore Azumarill's HP, and can ignore the Defense stat and shield effects of enemies hit.
upgrades.description2: After activating this move, Azumarill's next 3 basic attacks will also reduce the cooldown of all moves when they hit an enemy from a distance.

rsb.name: Aqua Tail
rsb.label: Damage - Basic (Close Range)
rsb.true_desc: Increases the speed and area of effect of the next three auto attacks for 5s. If these auto attacks hit from a distance, they also deal increased damage and restore HP.
rsb.notes: Using Aqua Tail will overwrite any active Play Rough attack change. Aqua Tail attacks count as auto attacks for the purpose of items, lifesteal and other benefits.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Aqua Tail attacks that hit an enemy from a distance reduce the cooldown of all moves by 0.8s per enemy hit.

skills.name: Belly Bash
skills.buffs: 30% Movement Speed, 30% CDR, 20% Max HP Shield
skills.description: Azumarill pounds their belly 3 times, granting a shield. With each pound, Azumarill loses HP in exchange for increased Attack. Azumarill can move while pounding their belly. Afterward, target an enemy and then charge at the target; dealing damage to them and throwing all enemies hit while charging.

rsb.name: Belly Bash
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Azumarill pounds their belly three times; losing 5% remaining HP with each pound in exchange for a 5% max HP shield that stacks with each pound and lasts 6s. Azumarill also gains increased Attack for 5s and can move while pounding their belly. Afterward, target an enemy, then charge at the target, damaging and throwing all enemies hit while charging.
rsb.notes: Bonus Attack lasts for 5s and the shield lasts for 6s.

response.name: Blastoise
response.notes: Only auto attacks can critically strike, but Blastoise has 0% base Critical-Hit rate at all levels.

skills.name: Torrent
skills.description: When the Pokémon is at half HP or less, its Attack and Sp. Attack are increased.

rsb.name: Torrent
rsb.true_desc: Increases Attack and Sp. Attack by 20% while at half HP or less.

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Blastoise’s third auto attack is empowered - dealing 3 instances of damage, slowing enemies hit and reducing Blastoise’s move cooldowns by 1 second each.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing 3 instances of damage, slowing enemies hit by 50% for 1s, and reducing Blastoise’s move cooldowns by 1s.
rsb.notes: When evolving into Blastoise, auto attacks instead strike twice for 50% Atk.
rsb.add1_true_desc: When evolving into Blastoise, auto attacks now strike twice for 50% Atk.

skills.name: Water Gun
skills.description: Attacks with a shot of water, shoving enemies and decreasing their movement speed for a short time.

rsb.name: Water Gun
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Blastoise shoots a jet of water in a straight line; damaging, knocking back, and stunning enemies hit for .5s. Enemies hit are also slowed by 30% for 1s.

upgrades.name: Hydro Pump
upgrades.description1: Has the user attack by blasing out a huge volume of water, dealing damage to opposing Pokémon and shoving them when it hits.
upgrades.description2: Increases damage dealt by this move.

rsb.name: Hydro Pump
rsb.label: Damage (3 Hits)
rsb.true_desc: Blastoise shoots a large amount of water; damaging, knocking back, and stunning enemies hit for .5s.
rsb.add1_true_desc: Blastoise unleashes a large burst of water in a radius around themself; damaging, stunning, and knocking back enemies hit. Blastoise also gains a 30% movement speed bonus for the duration of this move.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increased damage.

upgrades.name: Water Spout
upgrades.description1: Spouts water toward the designated location, decreasing the movement speed of opposing Pokémon in the area of effect for a short time.
upgrades.description2: Increases damage dealt by this move.

rsb.name: Water Spout
rsb.label: Damage - Area (6 Hits)
rsb.true_desc: Blastoise calls down a barrage of water in a targeted radius. Enemies within the radius are struck 6 times over 3s, damaging and slowing them by 30% for 1s (refreshing every hit).
rsb.add1_label: Damage - Area (17 Hits) During Rapid Spin
rsb.add1_true_desc: Blastoise rapidly unleashes bursts of water in a radius around themselves dealing up to 17 instances of damage over the duration of Rapid Spin. Blastoise also gains a 30% movement speed bonus for the duration of this move.
rsb.add1_notes: The move button must be held for the duration of Rapid spin in order to trigger all of the additional attacks.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increased damage.
rsb.enhanced_add1_label: Damage - Area (17 Hits) During Rapid Spin

skills.name: Skull Bash
skills.description: Fiercely rams an opposing Pokémon and leaves it unable to act.

rsb.name: Skull Bash
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Blastoise dashes forward damaging and stunning all enemies hit for .5s.

upgrades.name: Surf
upgrades.description1: Has the user charge forward on a wave, shoving enemies and leaving them unable to act. The user becomes immune to hindrances while using this move and can jump in a designated direction once this move ends.
upgrades.description2: Also grants a shield when this move hits.

rsb.name: Surf
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Blastoise rides a large wave in the designated direction; damaging, knocking back, and stunning enemies hit for 1.6s. Blastoise is unstoppable while surfing, and once it ends, Blastoise can jump in a designated direction. The wave continues for a short duration after leaping off and the wave continues to knock back enemies hit but inflicts no damage.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Blastoise gains a small shield for 4s when hitting an enemy with Surf.

upgrades.name: Rapid Spin
upgrades.description1: Has the user spin rapidly, changing the mechanics of its basic attacks as well as its Hydro Pump and Water Spout moves.
upgrades.description2: Also reduces the damage the user receives while using this move.

rsb.name: Rapid Spin
rsb.label: Damage (10 hits)
rsb.true_desc: Blastoise withdraws into its shell and begins rapidly spinning for 5.5s; resetting the cooldown of its other move. Blastoise resists hindrances for the duration of Rapid Spin and can freely move about the battlefield. While spinning, Blastoise will damage nearby enemies. Blastoise’s next auto attack after Rapid Spin ends becomes boosted. For the duration of Rapid Spin, the mechanics of Blastoise’s auto attacks as well as Hydro Pump and Water Spout are changed.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Blastoise gains a massive amount of Def and SpDef for 7s.

skills.name: Hydro Typhoon
skills.description: Has the user spout water to attack while spinning, throwing enemies in a large area. This also grants the user a shield.

rsb.name: Hydro Typhoon
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Blastoise gains a shield for 4s and sweeps powerful water jets in a large circle around itself dealing massive damage and throwing enemies hit into the air for 1.5s.

response.name: Blissey
response.notes: Only auto attacks can critically strike, but Blissey has 0% base Critical-Hit rate at all levels.

skills.name: Natural Cure
skills.description: Removes all status condition from the Pokémon. This ability goes on cooldown after it's triggered.

rsb.name: Natural Cure
rsb.true_desc: Every 6s Blissey will automatically cleanse themselves. Natural Cure will activate even if Blissey has no active debuffs.

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack after a set amount of time passes, dealing increased damage.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Whenever Natural Cure activates, Blissey's next attack will become boosted, dealing increased damage.

skills.name: Pound
skills.description: Has the user attack by pounding in the designated direction, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and decreasing their movement speed for a short time when it hits.

rsb.name: Pound
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Blissey pounds in a designated direction; damaging and slowing enemies hit by 40% for 2s.

upgrades.name: Egg Bomb
upgrades.description1: Hurls an egg at the designated location. The egg then explodes, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and throwing them.
upgrades.description2: Also decreases the movement speed of enemies for a short time when they are thrown by this move.

rsb.name: Egg Bomb
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Blissey hurls an egg at a location which explodes; damaging and throwing enemies in the radius for .8s. Holds 2 uses in reserve and cannot be used more than once every 2s.
rsb.notes: When learning Soft Boiled and Egg Bomb, gain 2 additional charges for Soft Boiled. Charges are shared between both moves. Base cooldown becomes 5s for both moves and time between using the same move remains a 2s cooldown.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Also slows enemies by 40% for 2s after they're thrown.

upgrades.name: Helping Hand
upgrades.description1: For a short time, greatly increases the user's and nearby allies movement speed and basic attack speed. While this move's effects last, all of the user's basic attacks become boosted attacks.
upgrades.description2: Increases the damage of basic attacks while this move's effects last.

rsb.name: Helping Hand
rsb.true_desc: Blissey greatly improves movement speed and auto attack speed for self and allies by 35% for 3s. During this duration, all of Blissey's auto attacks are boosted. After this bonus expires, Blissey loses any boosted attack that was granted.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Also increases auto attack damage for all those affected by 15% for 3s.

skills.name: Heal Pulse
skills.description: Continually restores the user's and designated ally HP for a short time.

rsb.name: Heal Pulse
rsb.label: Healing (4x)
rsb.true_desc: Blissey continually restores HP as well as the HP of a designated ally for 2s, healing every 0.5s.

upgrades.name: Soft Boiled
upgrades.description1: Throws an egg to an ally, restoring its HP as well as the user's HP. A maximum of 3 uses can be kept in reserve for this move and cannot be used more than once every 2s.
upgrades.description2: Increases the maximum number of uses that can be kept in reserve.

rsb.name: Soft Boiled
rsb.label: Healing
rsb.true_desc: Blissey throws an egg to an ally; healing Blissey and the designated ally. Additionally healing every 1s for 2s afterwards. Holds 2 uses in reserve and cannot be used more than once every 2s.
rsb.notes: When learning Soft Boiled and Egg Bomb, gain 2 additional charges for Soft Boiled. Charges are shared between both moves. Base cooldown becomes 5s for both moves and time between using the same move remains a 2s cooldown.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Gain an additional charge.

upgrades.name: Safeguard
upgrades.description1: Blissey grants both the targeted ally and themself a shield, purging hindrances and making both immune to hindrances as long as the shield lasts.
upgrades.description2: Shield value increased.

rsb.name: Safeguard
rsb.label: Shield
rsb.true_desc: Blissey grants both the targeted ally and themself a shield for 3s; purging hindrances and making both immune to hindrances until the shield is removed (3s shield duration).
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Shield value increased.

skills.name: Bliss Assistance
skills.buffs: 30% Movement Speed, 30% CDR, 20% Max HP Shield
skills.description: Has the user dash to the designated ally to give it an egg, granting that ally a shield and increasing its Attack and Sp. Attack for a short time. The user also intercepts a portion of the damage received by that ally for a short time. While dashing, the user throws nearby enemies and those it comes in contact with.

rsb.name: Bliss Assistance
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Blissey dashes to the designated ally to give it an egg; granting that ally a shield and increasing their Attack and Sp. Attack by 20% for 6s. Blissey also intercepts 50% of the damage received by that ally for 6s. While dashing, throw hit enemies into the air for .8s. When reaching the target ally, deal additional damage to all nearby enemies.

response.name: Buzzwole
response.notes: Only auto attacks can critically strike. Buzzwole's Critical-Hit rate increases at levels 5 and 9.

rsb.name: Beast Boost
rsb.true_desc: When Buzzwole knocks out or assists in knocking out an enemy player, movement speed is increased by 100% and basic attack speed increase by 50% for 3s. Each time Buzzwole hits an enemy with basic attacks, Mega Punch, Lunge, or Smack Down - muscle gauge increases. Conversely, when Buzzwole is not in combat with enemy players, muscle gauge depletes by 1 increment every 5s. Up to 6 muscle gauge increments can be stored.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Each time a basic attack hits an enemy, increase muscle gauge by 1 increment. Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, throwing two consecutive punches while restoring Buzzwole's HP and increasing muscle gauge by 1 increment for each hit.

rsb.name: Mega Punch
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Jump in the designated direction before slamming the ground with a powerful punch. The shock from the punch deals damage to enemies in the area. If this move hits an enemy, muscle gauge increases by 1 increment for each enemy hit.

rsb.name: Lunge
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Lunge in the designated direction, dealing damage to enemies, decreasing their Attack by 30% for 2s and slowing them by 30% for 1s. If this move hits an enemy, muscle gauge increases by 1 increment for each enemy hit. After this move is used, Buzzwole's basic attack speed is increased by 30% for 2s. Holds 2 uses in reserve and cannot be used more than once every 1s.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Whenever this move hits enemy players, Buzzwole's Attack increases by 10% for 2s for each player hit (up to a max of 5 stacks).

rsb.name: Smack Down
rsb.label: Damage - Initial Hit
rsb.true_desc: Deliver an uppercut punch to an enemy in the designated direction; dealing damage and throwing them into the air. While the enemy is airborne, the user can activate this move again to perform a follow-up attack that smacks the target to the ground, dealing damage to all enemies in an area centered on the airborne enemy. When this move deals damage, muscle gauge increases by 2 increments for each enemy hit.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Widens the area-of-effect in which damage is dealt when the grappled enemy slams the ground. Additionally, muscle gauge will now increase by 3 increments for each enemy player hit from the slam.

rsb.name: Fell Stinger
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Consumes the entire muscle gauge and has the user deal damage to an enemy in the designated direction, briefly shoving and stunning them for .2s. The damage dealt by this move increases for each muscle gauge increment consumed at a rate of 12.5% per increment. If this move knocks out an enemy, the user recovers 10% of maximum HP.

rsb.name: Leech Life
rsb.label: Damage - per Tick
rsb.true_desc: Grab and restrain an enemy in the designated direction, dealing damage-over-time while restoring Buzzwole's HP. When this move is used, consume the user's entire muscle gauge. The number of hits and the amount of damage dealt per hit increases for each muscle gauge increment consumed. Number of hits starts at 4 and increases by 1 per 2 increments of muscle gauge consumed. Initial damage increases by 1.5% per muscle gauge increment. This move ends if Buzzwole becomes unable to act for any reason or if the restrained enemy escapes by using an Eject Button or through some other means.
rsb.notes: Against Unstoppable Targets: Only 1 instance of damage and healing will occur, equal to 5 hits.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Also causes each instance of damage dealt by this move to be stronger than the last by 5% additively.

rsb.name: Super Power
rsb.label: Damage - Initial
rsb.true_desc: Consumes the entire muscle gauge and has the user run in the designated direction and grab an enemy. The user then slams the target down on the ground at full strength, dealing damage to all enemies in the area and granting an 8% Max HP shield. The damage dealt by this move is increased at a rate of 12.5% per muscle gauge increment. The shield is increased at a rate of 1.5% Max HP per muscle gauge increment.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Resets the cooldown of this move when the user's muscle gauge reaches maximum.

skills.name: Ultra Swole Slam
skills.buffs: 30% Movement Speed, 30% CDR, 20% Max HP Shield

rsb.name: Ultra Swole Slam
rsb.label: Damage - Sweep
rsb.true_desc: Buzzwole flies at high speed, dealing damage to enemies in the area-of-effect. Afterward, the user targets the enemy with the lowest percentage of HP remaining among those hit and charges down at them from the sky, dealing area damage once again and additional damage to the targeted enemy based on their missing HP.
rsb.notes: Against Wild Pokemon: Missing HP damage is not dealt.

response.name: Charizard
response.notes: Only auto attacks can critically strike. Charizard's Critical-Hit rate increases at levels 5 and 9.

skills.name: Blaze
skills.description: While at half HP or less, critical-hit rate is increased.

rsb.name: Blaze
rsb.true_desc: Increases Critical-Hit Rate by 20% while at half HP or less.

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Deals continual damage. Deals increased damage to enemies that are burned and increases range when the user evolves.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage  - Basic (4x)
rsb.true_desc: Channel fire; dealing continual damage 4 times. Deal additional damage to enemies that have been burned by Charizard. This additional damage can not critically strike. Auto attacks gain increased range when evolving.
rsb.notes: Against Wild Pokemon: The total damage is capped at 250.

skills.name: Flame Burst
skills.description: Attack with a bursting flame. When this move hits, it leaves enemies burned and increases the user's movement speed for a short time.

rsb.name: Flame Burst
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Charizard attacks with a bursting flame forward, exploding on the first enemy hit, dealing damage and burning enemies in a small radius. Charizard gains a 20% movement speed bonus for 3s when hitting an enemy. The burn lasts 4s and reduces enemy Attack by 5%.

upgrades.name: Flamethrower
upgrades.description1: Attack with an intense blast of fire. When this move hits, it leaves enemies burned and increases the user's movement speed for a short time.
upgrades.description2: Increased damage and the damage caused by burning.

rsb.name: Flamethrower
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Attacks with a blast of fire while moving, damaging and burning enemies in a line. Charizard gains a small movement speed bonus by 40% for 4s if they hit. The burn lasts 4s and reduces enemy Attack by 5%.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Deals increased damage.

upgrades.name: Fire Punch
upgrades.description1: Punch with a fiery fist, dealing damage and shoving enemies when it hits. Also leaves the enemies it shoves burned.
upgrades.description2: Reduced cooldown every time a basic attack hits.

rsb.name: Fire Punch
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Charizard punches forward, damaging and shoving enemies in their path. The first enemy hit is burned. The burn lasts 4s and reduces enemy Attack by 5%.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Cooldown reduces by .3s per target, every time Charizard damages an enemy with an auto attack (1.2s total for an entire auto attack animation on a single target).

skills.name: Fire Spin
skills.description: Encircles enemies in the area of effect in a vortex of fire. After this move hits, it deals damage over time and decreases the movement speed of enemies for a short time.

rsb.name: Fire Spin
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Charizard shoots a burst of fire forward, exploding on the first enemy hit or after traveling max distance, dealing damage over time every 0.5s and slowing enemies within the radius by 25% for 1s (refreshing on every damage tick).

upgrades.name: Fire Blast
upgrades.description1: Blasts intense, all-consuming fire, dealing damage over time to enemies while the flames continue to burn on the ground and decreasing the movement speed of enemies for a short time.
upgrades.description2: Increased damage.

rsb.name: Fire Blast
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Charizard shoots a blast of fire forward while moving, exploding on the first enemy hit or after a short distance, damaging enemies and leaving a fire area for 5s that deals damage over time every 0.5s and slows enemies within the radius by 35% for 1s (refreshing on every damage tick).
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increased damage.

upgrades.name: Flare Blitz
upgrades.description1: Charge forward cloaked in fire, granting the user a shield and throwing enemies hit.
upgrades.description2: Decreases movement speed of enemies for a short time when they are thrown.

rsb.name: Flare Blitz
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Charizard charges forward, shielding themself for 5s, throwing the targeted enemy and dealing damage in an area.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Also slows enemies by 40% for 3s after thrown.

skills.name: Seismic Slam
skills.description: Fly up into the air, allowing the user to move freely over obstacles. While this move is being used, basic attacks deal increased damage and leave enemies burned. In addition, when dealing damage to an enemy, recover HP. Using this move again on an enemy will grab it and slam it onto the ground.

rsb.name: Seismic Slam
rsb.label: Damage - Burning (2x)
rsb.true_desc: Grab an enemy and slam it onto the ground, damaging the target and nearby enemies and deal additional damage based on their max HP. Then, fly up into the air moving freely over obstacles for 7.5s and gaining Hindrance Resistance. While this move is active, auto attacks apply a burn to the target which lasts for 1s, dealing 2 instances of damage and is refreshed by each instance of damage from auto attacks. When dealing damage with auto attacks to an enemy (not from burn or additional damage), recover HP equal to 80% of the damage dealt.

response.name: Cinderace
response.notes: Only Blaze Kick and auto attacks can critically strike. Cinderace's Critical-Hit rate increases at levels 5 and 9.

skills.name: Blaze
skills.description: When using a move, the next basic attack becomes a boosted attack. When hitting an enemy with a basic attack or move, a cinder is placed on that enemy. Attacking a cindered enemy a certain number of times will cause the cinder to flare, dealing damage to the enemy. When at half HP or less, critical-hit rate is increased by 10% and basic attack speed is increased by 20% for a short time.

rsb.name: Blaze
rsb.true_desc: When at half HP or less, critical-hit rate is increased by 10% and auto attack speed is increased by 20% for 5s (30s cooldown). When hitting an enemy with an auto attack, a cinder is placed on that enemy for 5s. Boosted Attacks and moves apply 2 cinders. When the target receives it's 5th cinder, they will all be consumed to deal additional damage to the enemy.
rsb.notes: Against Wild Pokemon: The total damage is capped at 500.
rsb.add1_notes: Against Wild Pokémon: The additional damage from maximum HP is capped at 500.

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing increased damage when it hits.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack or when using a move, dealing increased damage.
rsb.notes: Against Wild Pokemon: Basic Attack damage is capped at 1000 and Boosted Attack damage is capped at 1300.

skills.name: Ember
skills.description: Shoot out a small flame, dealing damage to enemies, leaving them burned and decreasing their Attack for a short time.

rsb.name: Ember
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Cinderace shoots out a small flame, damaging and applying burn to hit enemies. The burn lasts 3s ticking damage once every second and reduces enemy Attack and Sp. Attack by 5% for 2s.

upgrades.name: Pyro Ball
upgrades.description1: Kick a ball of flame in the designated direction, dealing damage to enemies and leaving them burned for a short time when this move hits.
upgrades.description2: Reduces the cooldown of Flame Charge or Feint when this move hits.

rsb.name: Pyro Ball
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Cinderace kicks a ball of flame in a designated direction, burning and damaging enemies hit. The burn lasts 3s ticking damage once every second and reduces enemy Attack and Sp. Attack by 5% for 2s.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Reduces the cooldown of Flame Charge or Feint by 3.5s when this move hits.

upgrades.name: Blaze Kick
upgrades.description1: Perform a fiery flying kick. This move is always a critical hit, and it shoves enemies and leaves them burned for a short time. In addition, become immune to hindrances while using this move.
upgrades.description2: Increases basic attack speed for a short time when this move hits.

rsb.name: Blaze Kick
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Perform a fiery flying kick, jumping towards a designated enemy; shoving and burning them. Cinderace can land in a targeted direction after this move hits. In addition, Cinderace is immune to hindrances during this move and is always a critical-hit. The burn lasts 3s ticking damage once every second and reduces enemy Attack and Sp. Attack by 5% for 2s.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increased auto attack speed by 65% for 3s after this move hits.

skills.name: Low Sweep
skills.description: Make a swift low sweep in the designated direction, dealing damage to any enemy it hits.

rsb.name: Low Sweep
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Cinderace makes a swift low sweep in the designated direction, damaging any enemy it hits.

upgrades.name: Flame Charge
upgrades.description1: Charge forward cloaked in flame, dealing damage to any enemy hit.
upgrades.description2: The next boosted attack after this move ends also decreases the movement speed of enemies hit for a short time.

rsb.name: Flame Charge
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Cinderace charges forward, damaging all enemies hit.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: The next boosted attack after this move ends also slows enemies hit by 30% for 2s.

upgrades.name: Feint
upgrades.description1: Increases movement speed for a short time and become invincible.
upgrades.description2: After this move is used, basic attacks that hit enemies restore HP (up to 3 times).

rsb.name: Feint
rsb.true_desc: Cinderace dodges, increasing movement speed by 25% for 2s and becoming briefly invincible for 44 frames (.73s).
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: After dodging, the next 3 auto attacks that hit restore HP equal to 30% of damage dealt.

skills.name: Blazing Bicycle Kick
skills.buffs: 30% Movement Speed, 35% Attack Speed, 20% Max HP Shield
skills.description: Create a giant ball of flame and kick it toward the designated location. The ball releases a fierce shock wave that deals damage to enemies in the area of effect. Also increases movement speed by 10% (stacks with the Unite Buffs) for 5s when it hits.

rsb.name: Blazing Bicycle Kick
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Create a giant ball of flame and kick it toward the designated location. The ball releases a fierce shock wave that deals damage to enemies in the area of effect. Also increases movement speed by 10% (stacks with the Unite Buffs) for 5s when it hits.

response.name: Garchomp
response.notes: Only auto attacks can critically strike. Garchomp's Critical-Hit rate increases at levels 5 and 9.

skills.name: Rough Skin
skills.description: When struck by a melee attack, a portion of the damage received is reflected back at the attacker.

rsb.name: Rough Skin
rsb.true_desc: When Garchomp takes a hit from a melee Pokémon; 30% of that damage is also dealt to the attacker. 2s cooldown and this damage is subject to defense reduction.

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack with every fifth attack, dealing increased damage and restoring the user's HP. Every time a basic attack or move hits an enemy, basic attack speed is increased.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Any attack or move that hits provides a boosted stack. Stacks last 4s and decay together. At 5 stacks, all of Garchomp's auto attacks become boosted; dealing more damage, attacking faster, gaining 15% lifesteal, and dealing 10% of enemy remaining HP as damage.
rsb.notes: Against Wild Pokémon: Basic Attack damage is capped at 1000, Boosted Attack damage is capped at 1100, and additional damage from remaining HP is capped at 350.

skills.name: Sand Attack
skills.description: Hurls sand, narrowing the field of vision of enemies and decreases their movement speed for a short time. Also increases movement speed and basic attack speed.

rsb.name: Sand Attack
rsb.true_desc: Garchomp hurls sand toward a designated area; reducing enemy visibility by 50% and slowing them by 20% for 2s. Garchomp's movement speed is increased by 30% for 2s and auto attack speed is increased by 30% for 3s if an enemy is hit.

upgrades.name: Dig
upgrades.description1: Burrow underground and move quickly in the designated direction, jumping out when coming in contact with an enemy or when traveling the maximum distance. This jump deals damage to enemies in the area of effect and throws them.
upgrades.description2: Damage received is reduced for a short time after jumping out of the ground.

rsb.name: Dig
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Garchomp quickly dives underground in a short dash; then bursts from the ground at the end of the designated area or beneath the first enemy hit, dealing damage in a small radius and throwing enemies into the air for 0.5s. Defense and Sp. Def. are increased for 3s after jumping out of the ground.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increased throw duration to 1s.

upgrades.name: Dragon Rush
upgrades.description1: Back up to create distance before diving to attack in the designated direction, shoving enemies. The user can use Dragon Claw while creating distance at the start of this move to create a combo attack. (This move can crit)
upgrades.description2: Decreases the movement speed of enemies for a short time when they are shoved the maximum distance.

rsb.name: Dragon Rush
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Garchomp jumps back and briefly channels before diving forward; dragging all enemies within a small radius to the designated area and reducing damage taken by 30% for .9s; then deals damage in a radius. Garchomp can use Dragon Claw during the first half of the channel to add the Dragon Claw hits as a combo attack, replacing the radial damage at the end of the move with a damaging stun and slow.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Become unstoppable during this move.

skills.name: Bulldoze
skills.description: Stomp down on the ground, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect.

rsb.name: Bulldoze
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Garchomp stomps the ground forcefully; dealing damage in a radius.

upgrades.name: Earthquake
upgrades.description1: Jump high into the air and crash forcefully to the ground, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect.
upgrades.description2: Decrease the movement speed of enemies for a short time if they are in this move's area of effect.

rsb.name: Earthquake
rsb.label: Damage - Initial
rsb.true_desc: Garchomp jumps and crashes forcefully to the ground; dealing damage in a wide radius and slowing enemies by 30% for 2s. After the initial damage, two aftershocks occur in the designated area; each dealing less damage than the initial move.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Slow increased to 45% near the center.

upgrades.name: Dragon Claw
upgrades.description1: Attack twice in front of itself using its claws. The first attack deals damage to enemies and throws them. The second attack deals increased damage. After the move ends, basic attack speed is increased for a short time. (This move can crit)
upgrades.description2: Increase damage dealt.

rsb.name: Dragon Claw
rsb.label: Damage - First Hit
rsb.true_desc: Garchomp viciously claws everything in the designated area twice. The first attack deals damage and pushes enemies. The second attack deals increased damage and slows movement speed by 45%. When using Dragon Rush combo with this move, increase the slow to 60%.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increased damage.

skills.name: Livid Outrage
skills.description: Has the user unleash a powerful chain attack while dashing forward. The final attack throws enemies but also leaves the user unable to act for a short time.

rsb.name: Livid Outrage
rsb.label: Damage - First Hit
rsb.true_desc: Garchomp goes berzerk, taking 30% less damage for 5s and unleashes a powerful, unstoppable chain attack. Garchomp dashes and deals damage in the designated area five times; taking a brief moment to aim before every attack. Every attack has a different designated area and does more damage than the last. The fifth and final attack stuns Garchomp for .5s and throws all enemies hit into the air. Enemies hit are slowed by 30% for 1s.

response.name: Crustle
response.notes: Only auto attacks and X-Scissor can critically strike, but Crustle has 0% base Critical-Hit rate at all levels.

skills.name: Sturdy
skills.description: Gains a stacking Def/SpDef buff for every 7% HP missing. Stacks up to 10 times.

rsb.name: Sturdy
rsb.label: Def & Sp. Def - Increase (Stacks 10x)
rsb.true_desc: Gain Defense and Sp. Defense for every 7% of Crustle's missing HP. Stacks 10 times.

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack. When this boosted attack hits, it deals damage to enemies in the area of effect and decreases their movement speed for a short time.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack. When this boosted attack hits, it deals damage to enemies in the area of effect and decreases their movement speed by 40% for 2s.

skills.name: Rock Slide
skills.description: Drops large rocks on the designated area. When this move hits, it deals damage to enemies in the area of effect and leaves them unable to act for a short time.

rsb.name: Rock Slide
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Crustle drops rocks in a small radius, stunning enemies hit for 1s.

upgrades.name: Rock Tomb
upgrades.description1: Splits open the ground toward the designated area, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and creating a barricade of rock. Activating this move again removes the barricade.
upgrades.description2: Decreases the movement speed of enemies for a short time when this move hits.

rsb.name: Rock Tomb
rsb.label: Damage - Projectile
rsb.true_desc: Crustle emits a beam that deals damage to enemies hit and briefly slow their movement speed by 60% for 2s, then create a curved wall at the designated location. When the wall rises or despawns, nearby enemies are damaged and have their movement speed slowed by 60% for 2s. The wall lasts for 3s and can be cancelled early.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Movement speed reduction increased to 80%.

upgrades.name: Shell Smash
upgrades.description1: Convert a set percentage of Defense and Sp. Defense into Attack and Sp. Attack and increase movement speed for a short time.
upgrades.description2: Increased conversion rate.

rsb.name: Shell Smash
rsb.true_desc: Crustle smashes their shell, setting Def and SpD to 0, gaining a boost to Atk and SpA equal to 40% of the Def and SpD lost, respectively. Additional Def and SpD from items and buffs (including Crustle's passive) are exempt. Crustle also gains 75% movement speed (decreasing by 5% every 1s) and becomes unstoppable for 0.8s while activating this move. This buff lasts for 4.5s.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Def and SpD conversion is increased from 40% to 50%.

skills.name: Fury Cutter
skills.description: Slashes enemies with claws, dealing damage to them. Hitting the same enemy multiple times in succession with this move increases the damage dealt.

rsb.name: Fury Cutter
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Crustle attacks once with his claws. Enemies hit by Fury Cutter receive a debuff for 9s that causes subsequent Fury Cutter attacks to deal 20% additional damage. Maximum 2 debuff stacks. Additional damage from this debuff is always rounded up.

upgrades.name: Stealth Rock
upgrades.description1: Throws many small rocks. When a rock hits an enemy or when the rocks have flown their full distance, a zone of many levitating rocks is created dealing slowly-increasing damage over time to enemies in the area of effect.
upgrades.description2: Increases the duration of this move's effects and decreases the movement speed of enemies for a short time when this move hits.

rsb.name: Stealth Rock
rsb.label: Damage (8 Ticks)
rsb.true_desc: Crustle launches a pile of rocks in the designated direction. Upon hitting an enemy, a wall, or reaching maximum distance, create a radius in which rocks deal damage to enemies up to 8 times every .5s over 4s. Each hit applies a stack of a debuff which causes subsequent hits to deal 15% more damage for 1.5s, stacking up to 10 times. Additional damage from this debuff is always rounded up.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Duration of rocks increased by 1s. Number of hits increased from 8 to 10. In addition, slow enemy movement speed by 35% for 1s.

upgrades.name: X-Scissor
upgrades.description1: Dash forward with crossed claws, dealing damage to enemies multiple times and shoving them. Leaves enemies unable to act if they hit an object when shoved.
upgrades.description2: Reduced cooldown.

rsb.name: X-Scissor
rsb.label: Damage - First Hit
rsb.true_desc: Crustle attacks three times with his claws, dealing increased damage with each hit and shoving enemies for .2s with each hit. Stuns for 1.5s if the enemy is against a wall when the third hit lands.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Cooldown reduced by 1s.

skills.name: Rubble Rouser
skills.description: Gain a shield for a short time and leave nearby enemies unable to act, dealing damage over time to them. If the user receives damage while this move is in effect, the move deals additional hits to nearby enemies.

rsb.name: Rubble Rouser
rsb.label: Damage - Revenge
rsb.true_desc: Summon a whirlwind of rocks. At the beginning leave nearby enemies stunned for 1s and gain a shield (40% max HP + 600 HP). Then deal damage to nearby enemies every 1s for 10s, and if Crustle receives damage while this move is in effect deal additional revenge damage (this cannot happen more than once every 2s).

response.name: Slowbro
response.notes: Only auto attacks can critically strike, but Slowbro has 0% base Critical-Hit rate at all levels.

skills.name: Oblivious
skills.description: When Slowbro receives damage, the HP loss is gradual. When damaging an opponent with a move, restore some of the remaining gradual HP loss and decrease the target's Sp. Defense.

rsb.name: Oblivious
rsb.true_desc: Slowbro stores up lost HP for a short time (blue HP). Slowbro's Oblivious health remains for 6s and then decreases by 3% max HP every second. When dealing damage to an enemy with Water Gun, Scald, Surf, or Slowbeam - decrease the enemy's Sp.Def by 4% for 5s, stacking up to 5 times.

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack. When this boosted attack hits, deal damage to nearby opposing Pokémon and decrease their movement speed.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack. When this boosted attack hits, deal damage to nearby enemies and decrease their movement speed by 30% for 1s.

skills.name: Water Gun
skills.description: Slowbro channels a fierce stream of water which deals damage and lowers movement speed. Increase the area of effect and damage the longer this move is channeled.

rsb.name: Water Gun
rsb.label: Damage - Uncharged
rsb.true_desc: Slowbro fires a stream of water, damaging and slowing enemies hit by 35% for 1s. This move can be channeled to increase its range and damage. Slowbro's movement speed is reduced while channeling. Restore some of Slowbro's Oblivious health (blue HP) once, after hitting an enemy.

upgrades.name: Scald
upgrades.description1: Deal damage to opposing Pokémon and create steam when it hits. Opposing Pokémon inside the steam's area are left burned and have their movement speed decreased.
upgrades.description2: Increased area of effect.

rsb.name: Scald
rsb.label: Damage - per Hit (3 Hits)
rsb.true_desc: Slowbro fires a stream of boiling water; damaging enemies hit, slowing them by 80% for .5s and creating a cloud of steam centered on the first enemy hit, which slows by 30% for 3s and applies a burn to all enemies inside. This burn reduces Attack by 40% for 3s. Restore 10% of Slowbro's Oblivious health (blue HP) once per stream instance after hitting an enemy (maximum 3 times).
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases the size of the steam cloud.

upgrades.name: Surf
upgrades.description1: Charge forward on a wave, dealing damage in an area and knock opponents back. This is followed by two more waves that deal damage and decrease enemy movement speed.
upgrades.description2: The second and third waves become larger and also knock enemies back like the first wave.

rsb.name: Surf
rsb.label: Damage - per Wave (3 Waves)
rsb.true_desc: Slowbro rides on a wave, damaging, knocking enemies back, and throwing them in the air for .4s. Two more waves follow after the first, damaging and slowing enemies by 25% for 1s. Restore 10% of Slowbro's Oblivious health (blue HP) per wave, when hitting at least one enemy (maximum 3 times).
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: The second and third waves will now also throw enemies in the air for .75s, and the second wave will knock them back.

skills.name: Slack Off
skills.description: Lay down and take a rest, continuously regaining health. Damage taken will reduce the recovery effect.

rsb.name: Slack Off
rsb.true_desc: Slowbro begins channeling a nap and gains a heal over time, healing 1.5% max HP every .5s for 3s. While Slowbro remains channeling its nap, all self-healing is doubled (including Slack Off healing)

upgrades.name: Amnesia
upgrades.description1: Nullify some damage before it takes effect. For a short time after using this move, become immune to hindrances and gain increased defense. Also increase the damage dealt by the next use of Scald or Surf.
upgrades.description2: Increases Sp. Attack.

rsb.name: Amnesia
rsb.true_desc: Slowbro briefly becomes unstoppable, gaining +300 Defense for 4s and restoring 22.5% of Slowbro's Oblivious health (blue HP) every second for 4s.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Also increases Slowbro's Sp. Defense by 150.

upgrades.name: Telekinesis
upgrades.description1: Make opposing Pokémon float with psychic power. If used again, pull the opposing Pokémon toward the user.
upgrades.description2: Increased range and firing speed.

rsb.name: Telekinesis
rsb.true_desc: Slowbro shoots a beam, causing the first enemy hit to float in the air for 2.3s, restoring 15% of Slowbro's Oblivious health (blue HP) every second for 5s. Slowbro can reactivate the ability to pull the enemy to themself, but otherwise cannot act for the duration.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases the range and speed of the beam.

skills.name: Slowbeam
skills.description: Stare at an enemy and attack continually, dealing damage and rooting them. Grants a shield and makes the user immune to hindrances while using this move.

rsb.name: Slowbeam
rsb.label: Damage (x6)
rsb.true_desc: Stare at an enemy and attack continually, dealing damage every .5 seconds for 3s and applying 'Bound' to them. This ability counters unstoppable. Grants a shield (10% max HP) and makes Slowbro immune to hindrances while using this move.

response.name: Snorlax
response.notes: Only auto attacks can critically strike, but Snorlax has 0% base Critical-Hit rate at all levels.

skills.name: Gluttony
skills.description: Increases the effects gained from eating Berries.

rsb.name: Gluttony
rsb.true_desc: Increases the effects gained from eating berries. 25% increased movement speed when near berries and doubles the amount healed from the Sitrus berry (yellow berry).

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack. When this boosted attack hits, it deals damage to nearby enemies and decreases their movement speed for a short time.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack. When this boosted attack hits, it deals increased damage to nearby enemies and decreases their movement speed by 20% for 1s.

skills.name: Tackle
skills.description: Charge forward belly first, dealing damage when it hits and shoving the first enemy it comes in contact with. After this move, the user's next basic attack becomes a boosted attack.

rsb.name: Tackle
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Snorlax dashes a short distance forward, dealing damage, stunning the first target hit for 1s, and slightly throwing them. Snorlax’s next auto attack is boosted.

upgrades.name: Heavy Slam
upgrades.description1: Has the user slam its heavy body down, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and throwing them.
upgrades.description2: Increased damage.

rsb.name: Heavy Slam
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Snorlax jumps to the target location, dealing damage and throwing enemies within the landing radius into the air for 1s.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increased damage.

upgrades.name: Flail
upgrades.description1: Has the user flail about, increasing the user's basic attack damage the lower the user's HP is.
upgrades.description2: Increased damage. If the user has low HP while using this move, its basic attacks that hit enemies will restore the user's HP.

rsb.name: Flail
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Snorlax buffs themselves for 5s causing auto attacks to deal increased damage and slow enemies hit. Damage increase is strengthened for every 20% HP Snorlax is missing. Snorlax also gains a short burst of increased movement speed by 70% for 2s, decreasing every .4s by 14%, and slows nearby enemies by 50% for 1.5s when Flail is activated.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increased damage. In addition, if Snorlax is below 40% HP,  auto attacks will also gain 30% lifesteal.

skills.name: Rest
skills.description: Has the user fall asleep on the spot and restores its HP. Blocks the movement of all enemies while this move is in effect.

rsb.name: Rest
rsb.true_desc: Snorlax falls asleep for 3s, becoming unstoppable, and healing 3 times for 8% Max HP. While asleep enemies cannot pass through Snorlax’s hitbox.

upgrades.name: Block
upgrades.description1: Has the user spread its arms wide to create a wall and grants it a shield. Prevents enemies from passing through the wall and shoves them if they run into it.
upgrades.description2: Reduces the damage the user receives while this move is in effect.

rsb.name: Block
rsb.true_desc: Snorlax creates and holds a wall in a targeted direction for 4s and gains a shield. The shield lasts 3.5s even if Block is cancelled early. Enemies that contact the wall are knocked back and stunned for .45s. This knockback can occur every 1s (max 4 times). Snorlax cannot attack or use abilities while Blocking but can move with a 45% reduced movement speed.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: The Block becomes larger and the knockback and stun occurs every 0.5s (max 8 times). While blocking, Snorlax’s Def and SpDef are increased by 25%.

upgrades.name: Yawn
upgrades.description1: Has the user let loose a huge yawn that lulls enemies into a sleepy haze, putting enemies hit by this move to sleep.
upgrades.description2: Decrease the movement speed of enemies for a short time when this move hits.

rsb.name: Yawn
rsb.true_desc: Snorlax sends out a slow short-range projectile that puts all targets hit to Sleep for 3s.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Enemy movement speed reduced by 35% for 3s upon waking up.

skills.name: Power Nap
skills.description: Go to sleep and begin snoring, dealing damage over time to enemies in the area of effect and throw them. While sleeping, become immune to hindrances and continually restore HP.

rsb.name: Power Nap
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Go to sleep and begin snoring, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and throws them in the air for 1s. While sleeping enemies cannot pass through Snorlax’s hitbox, Snorlax becomes immune to hindrances, deals damage over time to nearby enemies, slow enemies hit by 30% for 1s, and continually restore 7% of max HP, 9 times. This move can be recasted to flip over, dealing an extra instance of the DoT damage and throwing enemies in the air for 1s.
rsb.add1_true_desc: Deals 50% of the initial damage, 3 times.

response.name: Gengar
response.notes: Only auto attacks can critically strike, but Gengar has 0% base Critical-Hit rate at all levels. At level 5, Gengar gains 12.5% spell vamp (restores HP when dealing Special Attack damage).

skills.name: Levitate
skills.description: Increases movement speed when out of combat. (7s after leaving combat)

rsb.name: Levitate
rsb.true_desc: Increases movement speed by 10% when out of combat for 5s.

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, lunging at an enemy and dealing damage.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, teleporting to an enemy (even through walls) and dealing increased damage.

skills.name: Will-o-Wisp
skills.description: Shoot multiple sinister flames, dealing damage to enemies and leaving them burned when it hits.

rsb.name: Will-o-Wisp
rsb.label: Damage - per Wisp (3 Wisps)
rsb.true_desc: Gengar shoots 3 wisps of flame in a cone, damaging and burning enemies hit for 2s. This burn reduces enemy Attack and Sp. Attack by 10% for 4s. A single enemy can only be damaged by a maximum of 2 wisps. Damage is halved if the target is burning.

upgrades.name: Shadow Ball
upgrades.description1: Hurl a shadowy blob at the target, decreasing the movement speed and Sp. Defense of enemies for a short time when it hits.
upgrades.description2: Increased damage.

rsb.name: Shadow Ball
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Gengar hurls a shadowy ball forward in a line; damaging, slowing their movement speed by 90% for 1s, and reducing the Sp. Defense of enemies hit for 3s. This ball pierces through wild Pokémon.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increased damage.

upgrades.name: Sludge Bomb
upgrades.description1: Hurl unsanitary sludge to the designated area, leaving enemies poisoned when it hits.
upgrades.description2: Increased poison duration.

rsb.name: Sludge Bomb
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Gengar hurls unsanitary sludge to the designated area, damaging enemies and poisoning them for 5s.  Poison deals 1% of the Pokemon's max HP per tick.
rsb.notes: Against Wild Pokémon: The poison damage is capped at 120 per tick.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increased area duration by 1s (adds 2 additional ticks)

skills.name: Lick
skills.description: Attacks with the user's tongue and pulls enemies toward the user.

rsb.name: Lick
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Gengar attacks forward in a line with their tongue, damaging enemies hit, and pulling them to Gengar. The next auto attack is boosted.

upgrades.name: Dream Eater
upgrades.description1: Puts enemies to sleep when it hits. If used again while a nearby enemy is asleep, the user appears behind the target and attacks, restoring HP and reducing the cooldown of Shadow Ball or Sludge Bomb.
upgrades.description2: Increased damage and HP restored.

rsb.name: Dream Eater
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Gengar shoots forward a mysterious orb, sleeping enemies for 1s when it hits. If used again when a nearby enemy is affected by Dream Eater, Gengar teleports behind them and attacks; dealing damage to the enemy, healing Gengar, and reducing the cooldown of Will-o-Wisp, Shadow Ball or Sludge Bomb by 2s. Before and after teleporting, the next auto attack is boosted. If Gengar knocks out an enemy player, the cooldown of this move is reset.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increased damage and healing.

upgrades.name: Hex
upgrades.description1: Disappear and move to the designated location, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect when the user reappears. If this hits an enemy that is afflicted by a status condition, it deals increased damage and its cooldown is reduced.
upgrades.description2: Increased damage.

rsb.name: Hex
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Gengar vanishes and teleports to a designated location, damaging enemies in a radius where Gengar appears. If this hits an enemy afflicted with a status condition, damage dealt is doubled and Hex cooldown is reduced by 85%. The next auto attack is boosted.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increased damage.

skills.name: Phantom Ambush
skills.description: Jump to the designated area and start sneaking with increased movement speed. If this move is used again, it deals damage to enemies in the area of effect and decreases their movement speed for a short time.

rsb.name: Phantom Ambush
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Jump to the designated area and start sneaking for 7s - gaining 30% increased movement speed, become invisible, and the next auto attack is boosted. Moves and auto attacks can be used while invisible, but bring you above the ground. While above the ground, become visible to the enemies. If this move is used again, deal damage to enemies in the area of effect and decrease their movement speed by 50% for 1.5s.

response.name: Pikachu
response.notes: Only auto attacks can critically strike, but Pikachu has 0% base Critical-Hit rate at all levels. At level 9, Pikachu gains 12.5% spell vamp (restores HP when dealing Special Attack damage).

skills.name: Static
skills.description: Paralyzes all enemies nearby for a short time when receiving damage. This ability goes on cooldown after it's triggered.

rsb.name: Static
rsb.true_desc: Paralyzes (slow by 30% for 2.5s and reduce Attack Speed by 10% for 2s) all enemies nearby when receiving damage. This ability goes on a 30s cooldown after it's triggered.

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing increased damage. This boosted attack also paralyzes enemies for a short time when it hits.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing increased damage. This boosted attack also paralyzes (slow by 30% for 1s and reduce Attack Speed by 10% for 1s) enemies when it hits.

skills.name: Thunder Shock
skills.description: Release electricity, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect. Also paralyzes enemies for a short time.

rsb.name: Thunder Shock
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Pikachu releases electricity to a designated area, damaging enemies in the radius. Also paralyzes (slow by 30% for 1s and reduce Attack Speed by 10% for 1s) enemies hit.

upgrades.name: Electro Ball
upgrades.description1: Hurl an electric orb, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and leaving them paralyzed for a short time. This move's damage increases the lower the enemies remaining HP is.
upgrades.description2: Increased damage.

rsb.name: Electro Ball
rsb.label: Damage - Area
rsb.true_desc: Pikachu hurls an electric orb at the targeted enemy, damaging and paralyzing (slow by 50% for 1s and reduce Attack Speed by 10% for 1s) all enemies in a small radius around the target upon impact. Deals bonus damage based on the enemy's missing HP.
rsb.notes: Against Wild Pokémon: The total damage is capped at 1200.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increased damage.

upgrades.name: Thunder
upgrades.description1: Drop wicked thunderbolts, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect.
upgrades.description2: Increases the number of times this move attacks.

rsb.name: Thunder
rsb.label: Damage - Area (5x)
rsb.true_desc: Pikachu drops wicked thunderbolts at a designated area for 2.5s, damaging enemies in the radius every 0.5s.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases the number of times this move strikes to 7. Does not increase the duration of the area.

skills.name: Electro Web
skills.description: Attacks and captures enemies using an electric net, leaving them unable to move.

rsb.name: Electro Web
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Pikachu attacks and captures enemies using an electric net, rooting them for 1.5s.

upgrades.name: Volt Tackle
upgrades.description1: Has the user electrify itself and charge ahead, throwing opposing Pokémon.
upgrades.description2: Reduced cooldown.

rsb.name: Volt Tackle
rsb.label: Damage (5x)
rsb.true_desc: Pikachu charges the targeted enemy, becoming unstoppable, damaging and throwing the target in the air for 1.4s.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Cooldown reduced by 2s.

upgrades.name: Thunderbolt
upgrades.description1: Attack with a strong electric blast, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and leaving them unable to act.
upgrades.description2: Increased damage.

rsb.name: Thunderbolt
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Pikachu attacks with a strong electric blast at a designated area; damaging and stunning enemies in the area for 1.25s.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increased damage.

skills.name: Thunderstorm
skills.buffs: 30% Movement Speed, 30% CDR, 30% Max HP Shield
skills.description: Attacks enemies near the user with tremendous bolts of lightning.

rsb.name: Thunderstorm
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Briefly become unstoppable and summon bolts of lightning 4 times over 3s in a radius around Pikachu. The first strike targets all enemy players in the radius and the next 3 strikes target a single random enemy player within the radius.Targets that are struck by bolts deal damage to their allies in a small area around them. Enemies in the area of multiple bolts during the first strike are only damaged once.
rsb.notes: All moves can be used during this Thunderstorm.
